item.description:
Lets all go to City Sports Grille at Yankee Lanes For Some Comedy!

Tickets are only $10. Plus the $1 meetup fee.

Please arrive at 7pm so we can all meetup, sit together and have appetizers before the comedy show.

The Comedians that will be performing are Bill Campbell and Rob Steen (with a special guess comic).  They're ALL amazing performers and the funniest comedians around! Your going to love them! Also-I will be hosting the comedy show!

Please read below on Bill Campbell and Rob Steen

I hope to see you all there!!

Bill Campbell is a veteran stand-up comedian whose talent has been pleasing audiences for 24 years. His universal family-oriented humor has made him a sought after headline performer throughout the U.S. and Canada. Bill has done it all, from small intimate comedy clubs to lavish cruise ships and corporate functions. He is a solid professional who night in and night out entertains his audiences with hilarious, poignant insights.

Rob Steenhas been doing comedy for 25 years. He began as a street performer at the age of 12 in Boston MA. Using his juggling and improv skills he decided to try Stand-Up! Since then he has kept a full calendar of over 350 shows per year! Rob has also been featured on several TV shows including The Late Show with David Lettermanwhere he is a frequent guest.

Rob is very high energy and will bring the whole audience together as a group with his unique style of crowd participation. His act is a mix of situations & observations that he has been in for the past 21 years of being an entertainer. Rob has been compared to Robin Williams due to his fast paced delivery & quick wit. Rob is great at working the crowd and making every show different. It is no wonder he is one of the most request comedians in the Northeast. Rob will keep you on your toes and laughing non-stop.

Rob pays great attention to detail and is able to adjust his act to nearly any crowd. This ability to adapt to any situation is has made his shows very popular. He is great at incorporating the whole audiance into his act. You never know where he will take you, but you will be laughing all the way. This is one act who is ready to BREAK OUT! You have to see him LIVE!

Television:
Late Show with Dave Letterman – CBS
Viva Variety - Comedy Central / Oddville – MTV
World's Funniest Videos – Fox / People are Talking – NBC America's Funniest Home Videos - ABC America's Funniest People - ABC
item.name: Appetizers & Comedy Night @ Yankee Lanes Portland in the City Sports Grille
